name: Spaghetti alla Nerano (Spaghetti with Fried Zucchini)
author: luv2cook
summary: This regional pasta dish from Naples is super simple and easy.
ingredients: ½ cup olive oil, or more as needed
2 cloves garlic, or more to taste
½ cup grated aged provolone cheese
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place zucchini slices on a plate and let dry for 1 hour
Heat 1/2 cup oil in a skillet over medium heat
Add zucchini slices in batches and deep fry until brown, 10 to 15 minutes per batch
Drain on paper towels and allow to cool
Place 3 tablespoons olive oil and garlic cloves in a large saucepan over low heat
Watch carefully and simmer until garlic cloves are a light golden brown and oil is infused with garlic flavor, 15 to 20 minutes
Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes
Drain spaghetti, reserving some cooking water
Add spaghetti and provolone cheese to the saucepan
Toss and add hot pasta water until sauce becomes creamy
Mix in basil, season with salt and pepper, and serve
